entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow and local blowing snow changing to periods of freezing drizzle or light snow mixed with ice pellets this morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Freezing drizzle or periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
